94df1df882950eced16e9d7cd15ac041.question_template: donne moi le nombre des eleves
94df1df882950eced16e9d7cd15ac041.sql_template:
SELECT 
    p.NomFr AS Nom, 
    p.PrenomFr AS Prenom, 
    e.DateNaissance, 
    c.NOMCLASSEFR AS Classe,
    pe.Type AS TypeParent,
    pe.NomFr AS NomParent,
    pe.PrenomFr AS PrenomParent,
    pe.Tel1 AS TelephoneParent
FROM 
    eleve e
JOIN 
    personne p ON e.IdPersonne = p.id
JOIN 
    inscriptioneleve ie ON e.id = ie.Eleve
JOIN 
    classe c ON ie.Classe = c.id
JOIN 
    parenteleve pe_rel ON e.id = pe_rel.Eleve
JOIN 
    parent pa ON pe_rel.Parent = pa.id
JOIN 
    personne pe ON pa.Personne = pe.id
WHERE 
    ie.AnneeScolaire = (SELECT id FROM anneescolaire WHERE AnneeScolaire = '2023/2024')
    AND ie.Annuler = 0
ORDER BY 
    c.NOMCLASSEFR, p.NomFr, p.PrenomFr;

61c3a921ad3abea010a938846edda4e9.question_template: donne moi le nombre des inscriptions pour l'annee {AnneeScolaire}
61c3a921ad3abea010a938846edda4e9.sql_template:
SELECT COUNT(*) AS nombre_inscriptions
FROM inscriptioneleve ie
JOIN anneescolaire a ON ie.AnneeScolaire = a.id
WHERE a.AnneeScolaire LIKE '%{AnneeScolaire}%' AND ie.Annuler = 0;

fc54e0ace1b2fce78174740277de6bdc.sql_template: SELECT COUNT(*) AS nombre_eleves FROM eleve e JOIN inscriptioneleve ie ON e.id = ie.Eleve WHERE ie.Annuler = 0
